oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Characterization of multiferroic thin films directly deposited on silicon for novel device applications
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PRASHANTHI, K
PALKAR, VR
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: we have investigated the multiferroic and dielectric properties in Dy modified BiFeO(3) thin films deposited directly on silicon using pulsed laser deposition (PLD) technique. The results support the usability of these films in multiferroic based MEMS devices as well as gate dielectrics for future CMOS applications.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INEC: 2010 3RD INTERNATIONAL NANOELECTRONICS CONFERENCE, VOLS 1 AND 2,900-901
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 3rd IEEE International Nanoelectronics Conference,Hong Kong, PEOPLES R CHINA,JAN 03-08, 2010
